title: paripalaya daasharatE
sahitya:
paripAlaya dAsharathE rAma mAm pAhi paripAlaya dAsharathE

caraNam 1

 kapaTa nATaka sUtradhAra kanaka paTAvrta lOkAdhara mAm
   
caraNam 2

 aparimIdAnanda bOdha rAma apa hrta shrta bhava bAdha
   
caraNam 3

 mArakOTi nibha dEha sukumAra pAlita vaidEha mAm
   
caraNam 4

 sharajitAsharA sarvasva rAma sharaNAgatApta sarvasva
   
caraNam 5

 pAmarajana gaNa dUra bhU pAmara nicayAdhAra mAm
   
caraNam 6

 pavanaja dhrta pAda kamala hrt-tApa vana kuTAra vinuta
   
caraNam 7

 rAjAdhrAja vESa tyAgarAja pUjita sam mrdubhASa mAm
